channel.title: Rep prestige
channel.description:
I would like to ask if a system could be implemented so that people with 200rep can "prestige" their reputation points back to 0. I'm not saying deleting all rep because the reputation people have already given us should stay because it's nice to be able to see the good things people have said about you. I'm suggesting this because everyone with 200rep now just spams and almost never helps out. When I had 10 rep I used to help out in the help section all the time.
Idea: once you "rep prestige" your rep turns a different color. IE: first time is red, second would be orange, third yellow. Etc darkening shades

I saw how excited you were about that in the super secret section :|, congratulations?

I think yours looks the best cause its a pro pic and not from a shitty phone.
[/quote]
In other words, that pic give Frell a hard on…[/quote]
Nah

item.title: Rep prestige
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:41, topic:329098”][quote author=Frell link=topic=425483.msg3125872#msg3125872 date=1266023458]

You can still receive rep at 200 points and see what others say about you, it just doesn’t go up anymore. If the reason a person helps the community is just to receive rep they are doing it for the wrong reason anyway.

I’m aware of this. However, the number stays the same therefore telling my mind that either I haven’t done shit well or no one liked what I did etc. Basically, set my rep to 0 but keep my old comments and shit please ^^

You act like you actually do shit.

Rep means nothing on moparscape as it is, only vets should be allowed to rep others, then it would have meaning.

Shut up and stop just repeating what you’ve heard staff members that rank higher than you say.

Thats cute.
[/quote]

How old are you? 13? You’re still really impressionable.[/quote]
15 honeybun

Read full topic

either way, by restricting it, it will be more valuable.

item.title: Rep prestige
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“eBuddy, post:1, topic:329162”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=425483.msg3125269#msg3125269 date=1265980140]

[quote author=casey. link=topic=425483.msg3125026#msg3125026 date=1265940370]

By applying this concept, rep can mean something. It could be an enjoyable experience. The fact that it could potentially take a while to get a max would apply a meaning behind it considering it couldn’t possibly mean nothing after so many reputation points. Even if the max were raised to accommodate this update, it wouldn’t make a difference as you all say; “rep means nothing”. So what’s the harm in applying something new to the concept other than introducing something new and possibly enjoyable.

you must be retarded

You can get 200 rep in a matter of minutes with out doing anything tbh.
[/quote]You must be retarded. If there were a prestige system involved, the max would be exponentially greater than 200, thus making it more difficult to max…

Also, unless you’re abusing reputation, in which case moderators would reset your rep, it’s difficult to get to 200 within “a matter of minutes” as you say…
[/quote]ITS TRUE, help one retard in one post and 5 people rep++ u omg[/quote]
rep++ good tut will use in future thx for sharing

Read full topic
